authors.author: Barney E. Warren Daniel S. Warner

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: His yoke is easy His burden is light, newline I've found it so I've found it so, newline His service is my sweetest delight, newline His blessings ever flow.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I've found my Lord and He is mine, newline He won me by His love, newline I'll serve Him all my years of time, newline And dwell with Him above.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: No other Lord but Christ I know, newline I walk with Him alone, newline His streams of love forever flow, newline Within my heart His throne.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: He's dearer to my heart than life, newline He found me lost in sin, newline He calmed the sea of inward strife, newline And bid me come to Him.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: My flesh recoiled before the cross, newline And Satan whispers there, newline Thy gain will not repay the loss, newline His yoke is hard to bear.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: I've tried the road of sin and found, newline Its prospects all deceive, newline I've proved the Lord and joys abound, newline More than I could believe.
